rawText:
Amarnath Yadav  
  • 9140259551 •  amarnath.y@protonmail.com  
As a seasoned Java professional with 5 years of experience, I excel in designing and developing high-impact 
microservices-based systems. My experFse in Java, microservices architecture, and system design enables me to 
create scalable, robust soluFons. I'm passionate about soIware engineering, a strong communicator, and a 
collaboraFve team player. With a track record of delivering quality projects on Fme and within budget, I'm 
dedicated to driving innovaFon and adding value to your organizaFon.  
Summary  
• Around 5 years of experience in soIware design and development through various Java/J2ee/Spring 
technologies and frameworks.  
• Key in contribuFng projects by understanding technical and funcFonal aspects of business. Strong 
technical skills in Java, JEE, Spring, Hibernate, Python, Agular, JavaScript, React, Web Services, XML, 
JSON, SOAP, and REST.  
• Experience and ExperFse in wriFng Micro Services using Java/Spring Boot and deploying them to a 
Cloud environment.  
• Have Experience in the AWS environment in parFcular used EC2, S3, and RDS.  
• Worked extensively in CollecJons, MulJthreading, JMS, JDBC, FILE IO, SerializaJon, and Socket 
programming.  
• Have a good understanding of Object-oriented programming concepts, MulJthreading, and Various 
design principles and Methodologies including Microservice Design paRerns.  
• Well-versed with Database management concepts, parFcularly with databases Mongo, MySQL, and 
PostgreSQL, DB2 Databases including wriFng SQL Queries, Stored Procedures and FuncJons.  
• Experience in Web and ApplicaFon servers like Tomcat, WebLogic, Fuse Service mix, OC4J, JBoss, 
Apache, and nginx.  
• Hands-on experience in wriFng Web services with ResWul using CXF, Jersey, Spring and validaFng 
Rest endpoints with Swagger, Postman, and SOAPUI.  
• Experience in wriFng Web Services using SOAP with JAX-WS standard. Experience with Jasper 
Reports /Jasper Template engine and generated CSV, pdf, and text reports million record level scale.  
• Hands-on experience in Apache AcJveMQ and KaYa messaging systems. Experience in building tools 
Maven, Ant, Jenkins and Logging frameworks Log4J, Slf4j and unit tesFng frameworks JUnit, 
Mockito, JMeter and code quality tools SonarQube, and FindBug.  
• Experience with version control tools SVN, CVS, GIT, TFS and release management tools JIRA.  
• Working experience developing and deploying soIware on plaWorms Windows, and Linux using tools 
PuRy, and WinSCP.  
• Good at release management and post-producFon issues.  
• Strong knowledge of installaFon and setup of applicaFons in Linux distribuFon. 
•  Experienced in all facets of soIware development life cycle, from requirements gathering, Analysis,  
• Design, Development, TesFng to product release.  
• Experienced in Agile, and Scrum-based development and good at working on sprints.  
  
  

Skills  
Languages: Java 8, Java 17, Java 21, Python, JavaScript, Angular, React  
Architecture: Microservices, Monolith  
Protocols: SOAP, REST  
ApplicaJon Framework: Spring Boot, Spring Context, Spring Security, Hibernate, Kubernetes, Docker.  
Web/Enterprise Server: Tomcat, JBoss, Apache, Nginx Programming   
Messaging: Kaca  
Frontend Technologies: Angular, React  
Project Tools: Maven, Ant, SVN, CVS, Git, TFS, Jenkins.   
Quality Tools: Sonar, FindBug   
Database: MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL  
Cloud: Google Cloud, AWS  
Experience  
JUN – 2023 -PRESENT  
Senior So(ware Engineer, AGILON HEALTH INC  
•
 
KaYa and Airflow IntegraJon: Developed a foundaFonal framework using Kaca and Airflow, enabling 
other teams to build on top of it efficiently. This foundaFonal work ensured seamless data streaming and 
orchestraFon across various services. 
•
 
End-to-End Project Leadership: Led the efforts from requirement gathering to the final producFon-ready 
code deployment. Coordinated with stakeholders to understand business needs, translated them into 
technical requirements, and ensured Fmely delivery of high-quality soIware soluFons. 
•
 
Enhanced XDR IntegraJon: Directed the integraFon of an enhanced XDR system for a new market 
region. This involved designing scalable and efficient soluFons, coordinaFng with cross-funcFonal teams, 
and ensuring the new integraFon met all regional compliance and performance standards. 
•
 
HL7 Processing System: Monitored, scaled, and performed extensive performance tesFng on a new HL7 
processing system. Ensured the system could handle large volumes of health data efficiently while 
maintaining high accuracy and reliability. 
•
 
AutomaJon TesJng Team Leadership: Spearheaded efforts to create an automaFon tesFng team for the 
new processing system. Recruited and mentored team members, established best pracFces, and ensured 
the team was equipped to handle comprehensive tesFng scenarios. 
•
 
AutomaJon TesJng SOP CreaJon: Created a Standard OperaFng Procedure (SOP) for the automaFon 
tesFng team. This SOP included guidelines, best pracFces, and detailed workflows to ensure consistent 
and efficient tesFng processes across the team. 
 
 
 
  
  

AUG – 2021 -JUN -2023  
SDE2, AGILON HEALTH INC  
• Microservices Architecture MigraJon: Led the transformaFon of the Minerva system from a monolithic 
architecture to a microservices-based architecture, significantly enhancing scalability, efficiency, and 
availability.  
• PDF Builder Service: Independently developed a PDF builder service and collaborated with a team to 
develop a Search Service as a microservice, improving applicaFon funcFonality and performance.  
• Invoicing System Development: Designed and implemented an advanced invoicing system for hospital 
services, replacing the outdated HIS system and streamlining day-to-day billing processes.  
• SOAP-based WSDL APIs: Implemented robust WSDL APIs for Minerva HIS, leveraging SOAP to enhance 
interoperability and data exchange.  
• XDR Document GeneraJon: Developed a system for Minerva HIS to generate XDR documents on health 
encounters, achieving a generaFon capacity of up to one million XDRs per day.  
• New Appointment System: Successfully collaborated with design and QA teams to develop and launch a 
new appointment system within 6 months, ahead of the scheduled Fmeline by 2 months.  
• Technical Mentorship: Provided mentorship and resolved complex technological issues across various 
projects, maintaining a customer saFsfacFon rate of over 97%.  
• DocumentaJon and Training: Documented all systems and applicaFons comprehensively, streamlining 
business procedures and significantly reducing onboarding Fme for new team members.  
  
  
  
  
  
SEP 2019 – AUG-2021  
SOFTWARE ENGINEER, OARI COLLAB PVT LTD  
• Search Grammar ImplementaJon: Implemented a Search Grammar on top of MongoDB to enhance 
search quality and minimize database hits.  
• Hotel Booking APIs: Developed REST APIs for hotel booking cancellaFons and automaFc refund 
generaFon, improving customer service efficiency.  
• IRCTC IntegraJon: Integrated IRCTC Fcket booking APIs into the exisFng OARI system, expanding system 
capabiliFes.  
• Coding and System Updates: ParFcipated in coding acFviFes, maintaining the integrity of program logic, 
and updaFng exisFng systems.  
• Cross-Pla`orm Development: Assisted senior technology soluFons team members in developing over 7 
soIware soluFons across web, desktop, and mobile plaWorms.  
• Project DocumentaJon: Created valuable project-specific assets such as knowledge transfer documents, 
test plans, defect summary reports, and lessons learned documents, successfully delivering 7 releases 
involving UAT and regression tesFng.  
• Rapid PromoJon: Promoted within 8 months due to strong performance and organizaFonal impact.   
Education  
JUNE 2020  
B.TECH | COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING  
DR. A.P.J. ABDUL KALAM TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY |LUCKNOW

extractedData.summary: As a seasoned Java professional with 5 years of experience, I excel in designing and developing high-impact microservices-based systems. My expertise in Java, microservices architecture, and system design enables me to create scalable, robust solutions. I'm passionate about software engineering, a strong communicator, and a collaborative team player. With a track record of delivering quality projects on time and within budget, I'm dedicated to driving innovation and adding value to your organization.

experience.description: Developed a foundational framework using Kafka and Airflow, enabling other teams to build on top of it efficiently. Led the efforts from requirement gathering to the final production-ready code deployment. Directed the integration of an enhanced XDR system for a new market region. Monitored, scaled, and performed extensive performance testing on a new HL7 processing system. Spearheaded efforts to create an automation testing team for the new processing system.

Led the transformation of the Minerva system from a monolithic architecture to a microservices-based architecture. Independently developed a PDF builder service. Successfully collaborated with design and QA teams to develop and launch a new appointment system.

Implemented a Search Grammar on top of MongoDB. Developed REST APIs for hotel booking cancellations and automatic refund generation. Integrated IRCTC ticket booking APIs into the existing OARI system. Participated in coding activities and updating existing systems. Assisted in developing over 7 software solutions across web, desktop, and mobile platforms.
achievements: Promoted within 8 months due to strong performance and organizational impact.
